snippet.title: SolarBlack Mixed Reality Trailer
snippet.description:
SolarBlack is a non-stop action-rhythm game that takes you into new spheres!

You will immerse yourself in fantastic worlds, breathe the thin air of the stratosphere and catapult yourself into new galaxies. Experience the immersion as you strike back Spherombs from their conquered territory as hard as possible in the rhythm of the modern soundtrack.

Featuring an intuitive tutorial experience for first time players which introduces the gameplay elements and the rules of the game. This early Access Demo includes two complete Worlds with local leaderboards and achievements to unlock.

Step into the world of SolarBlack!

Fully localized in: Chinese, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish.
